3.5.1.name: wordpress/url-cloak-encrypt
3.5.1.description:
SEO, Privacy, Encryption, Redirect, Invest and Affiliate Link Cloaker of URL inside your posts. Build in between page with delay sometime to show your ADs before directing visitors to trargeted page.


Features:

-Make long ugly affiliate links turn into short "hijack proof" url's. Turn all external long URLs into your-domain.com/short-url

-Improve your SEO by hide out-links from your posts

-URL Encryption

-Automatically process Redirect of URLs

-Showing your own ADs before directing visitors to targeted page

-Retain pagerank of your site by giving links out parameter that makes Googlebot think it was looking at a session id link and ignore it.

-Do Double Meta Refresh (DMR) method to prevent your site from appearing in the server logs of referred pages as referrer

-If (DMR) faild to hide a referrer then use public Anonymize links j.let
